Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we're confident it would be a perfect fit for your needs as well. We're offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $10,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, tailored to meet your expectations. We believe it's a fair offer that respects both the value of the product and your budget. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
